Question & Options:
In the 2008 film 'Disaster Movie', which original film is parodied in the spoof 'Goodie Two Shoes' written by Jason Friedberg and Aaron Seltzer?
Options:
A. Superbad
B. The Dark Knight
C. Iron Man
D. Twilight

In the 2008 film 'Disaster Movie', what was the original idea that was transformed into parodying disaster movies?
Options:
A. A horror movie concept
B. A romantic comedy plot
C. The idea for 'Goodie Two Shoes'
D. A superhero movie theme

In the 2008 film 'Disaster Movie', who was cast as the lead in 'Goodie Two Shoes'?
Options:
A. Kim Kardashian
B. Carmen Electra
C. Vanessa Lachey
D. Matt Lanter

In the 2008 film 'Disaster Movie', what role did Vanessa Minnillo sign up for?
Options:
A. Supporting cast member in Goodie Two Shoes
B. Main cast member in Goodie Two Shoes
C. Director of Goodie Two Shoes
D. Producer of Goodie Two Shoes
Correct Answer: Main cast member in Goodie Two Shoes

Question & Options:
In the 2008 film 'Disaster Movie', what role did Gary 'G Thang' Johnson play in the production?
Options:
A. He was the director.
B. He signed up to be a main cast member in 'Goodie Two Shoes'.
C. He was the script writer.
D. He composed the music score.
Correct Answer: He signed up to be a main cast member in 'Goodie Two Shoes'.
